Posts.EditableText: Whenever I start QDK 4.1.4 or test a program it installs "Free NaturalReader" several times over - as soon as the installer finishes, it closes and reopens. At first I just let it install completely, but this is getting ridiculous. I assume that if it really did install, it would only need to be installed and configured once, not multiple times every time I start QDK . Is there a fix in any more recent version? I am running it on Windows 7.
Posts.HTML:
Whenever I start QDK 4.1.4 or test a program it installs "Free NaturalReader" several times over - as soon as the installer finishes, it closes and reopens. At first I just let it install completely, but this is getting ridiculous. I assume that if it really did install, it would only need to be installed and configured once, not multiple times every time I start QDK . Is there a fix in any more recent version?
I am running it on Windows 7.

Posts.EditableText:
"Free NaturalReader" is nothing to do with Quest. Maybe it uses one of the same components that Quest uses, and hasn't installed properly?

I would try uninstalling "Free NaturalReader" or reinstalling it from wherever you got it from.
